name: Good Boy Wanwan
description:
Wanwan seems to be a very good dog. He takes well care of Blind Granny ! At least she thinks that he does... Lead this poor old and blind lady in the modern city close to her house so she can take care of a few errands...  But, be careful, walking in a city can be dangerous !

Control Wanwan with ZQSD or directional arrows, run with shift, move the camera with your mouse and press left click to continue dialogues!
